comments.content:
Looks like AvantGarde Gothic with some of its alternates recently re-released by ITC.

- Mike Yanega

Here is a link to the [FontShop showing](http://web.archive.org/web/20121028133529/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/itc/itc_avant_garde_gothic_pro_medium/), look at the Alternates and other glyphs in the OT set.

- Mike Yanega

Wow! Thank you. You definitely know your fonts. Thank you Mike, I appreciate it.

Regards

Pablo
